title: Salt Fat Acid Heat
overview: Salt Fat Acid Heat is the essential guide to the basic elements of good cooking. Each episode joins our spirited guide Samin as she travels to home kitchens of Italy, the southern islands of Japan, the heat of the Yucat√°n and back to Berkeley's Chez Panisse - where she started her culinary career - to demystify and explore the central principles of what makes food delicious and how each of us can easily incorporate those elements into every dish.
